TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RegexCompilationInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关使用正则表达式将正则表达式编译为独立程序集的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a regular expression that is used to compile a regular expression to a stand-alone assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个数组对象传递给方法以提供有关每个正则表达式以包含在程序集中的信息。An array of objects is passed to the method to provide information about each regular expression to be included in the assembly. 包含在程序集中每个已编译正则表达式表示为一个类派生自。Each compiled regular expression that is included in the assembly is represented as a class derived from . 属性类型定义正则表达式的类名、 完全限定的名称 （即，其命名空间和类型名称）、 其正则表达式模式、 任何其他选项 （如是否正则表达式不区分大小写），并指定正则表达式引擎搜索匹配项的长的超时间隔。The properties of the type define the regular expression's class name, its fully qualified name (that is, its namespace and its type name), its regular expression pattern, any additional options (such as whether the regular expression is case-insensitive), and a time-out interval that specifies how long the regular expression engine should search for a match. 可以实例化对象通过调用其重载的类构造函数。You can instantiate a object by calling its overloaded class constructor.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类包含有关要在程序集内包括的正则表达式的信息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a regular expression to be included in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个参数构造函数直接对应于属性的类。Each parameter of the constructor directly corresponds to a property of the class. 由于所有属性都均可读/写，也可以直接分配它们的值。Because all properties are read/write, their values can also be assigned directly. 方法将生成包含已编译的正则表达式的程序集。The method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. 因此，不应指定的值之一`options`。Therefore, you should not specify as one of the values of `options`. 如果`ispublic`是`true`，已编译的正则表达式类给定公共可访问性。If `ispublic` is `true`, the compiled regular expression class is given public accessibility. 也就是说，它可以执行的任何程序集中的代码中实例化。That is, it can be instantiated from code that executes in any assembly. 如果`ispublic`是`false`，在给定的已编译的正则表达式类`internal`（在 C# 中) 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 可访问性。If `ispublic` is `false`, the compiled regular expression class is given `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) accessibility. 也就是说，它可以仅从相同的程序集中的正则表达式类中执行的代码实例化。That is, it can be instantiated only from code that executes in the same assembly as the regular expression class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并在两个步骤中使用已编译的正则表达式。The following example creates and uses a compiled regular expression in two steps. 在第一个步骤中，编译并执行下面的代码示例。In the first step, compile and execute the following code example. 构造函数的代码示例中定义的已编译的正则表达式。The constructor in the code example defines a compiled regular expression. 执行代码的结果是名为 FishRegex.dll 包含名为的已编译的正则表达式类型的程序集`FishRegex`。The result of executing the code is an assembly named FishRegex.dll that contains a compiled regular expression type named `FishRegex`. [!code-csharp[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/cs/genFishRegex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/vb/genFishRegex.vb#1)] 在第二个步骤中，编译以下代码示例使用 FishRegex.dll 的引用并运行生成的可执行文件。In the second step, compile the following code example using a reference to FishRegex.dll, and then run the resulting executable file. 可执行文件匹配目标字符串使用`FishRegex`类型，并在目标字符串中显示匹配、 组、 捕获组和的匹配项的索引位置。The executable file matches a target string by using the `FishRegex` type, and displays the match, group, capture group, and index position of the matches in the target string. [!code-csharp[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/cs/useFishRegex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/vb/useFishRegex.vb#2)]

span.para: 此构造函数创建已编译的正则表达式使用在其中创建应用程序域的默认超时值。如果应用程序域中定义的超时值，则已编译的正则表达式使用值，即，禁止从超时的模式匹配操作。创建已编译的正则表达式的建议构造函数是，它允许您设置的超时间隔。

This constructor creates a compiled regular expression that uses the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is created. If a time-out value is defined for the application domain, the compiled regular expression uses the value , which prevents a pattern-matching operation from timing out. The recommended constructor for creating a compiled regular expression is , which lets you set the time-out interval.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类包含有关要在程序集内包括的指定的超时值的信息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a regular expression with a specified time-out value to be included in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个参数构造函数直接对应于属性的类。Each parameter of the constructor directly corresponds to a property of the class. 由于所有属性都均可读/写，也可以直接分配它们的值。Because all properties are read/write, their values can also be assigned directly. 方法将生成包含已编译的正则表达式的程序集。The method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. 因此，不应指定的值之一`options`。Therefore, you should not specify as one of the values of `options`. 如果`ispublic`是`true`，已编译的正则表达式类给定公共可访问性。If `ispublic` is `true`, the compiled regular expression class is given public accessibility. 也就是说，它可以执行的任何程序集中的代码中实例化。That is, it can be instantiated from code that executes in any assembly. 如果`ispublic`是`false`，在给定的已编译的正则表达式类`internal`（在 C# 中) 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 可访问性。If `ispublic` is `false`, the compiled regular expression class is given `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) accessibility. 也就是说，它可以仅从相同的程序集中的正则表达式类中执行的代码实例化。That is, it can be instantiated only from code that executes in the same assembly as the regular expression class. `matchTimeout`参数定义的已编译的正则表达式的默认超时间隔。The `matchTimeout` parameter defines the default time-out interval for the compiled regular expression. 此值表示已编译的正则表达式对象在操作超时和正则表达式引擎会抛出之前将执行单个匹配操作的时间的近似量在其下一步的计时检查过程中的异常.This value represents the approximate amount of time that a compiled regular expression object will execute a single matching operation before the operation times out and the regular expression engine throws a exception during its next timing check. 超时值的其他信息，请参阅属性。For additional information about the time-out value, see the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我们建议你始终设置已编译的正则表达式的默认超时值。We recommend that you always set a default time-out value for a compiled regular expression. 正则表达式库的使用者可以通过传递覆盖该超时值值，该值表示此构造函数重载的新的超时间隔。Consumers of your regular expression library can override that time-out value by passing a value that represents the new time-out interval to this constructor overload. ## Examples 下面的示例定义名为单个已编译的正则表达式`DuplicateChars`标识两个或多个输入字符串中的相同字符。The following example defines a single compiled regular expression named `DuplicateChars` that identifies two or more occurrences of the same character in an input string. 已编译的正则表达式具有的默认超时为 2 秒。The compiled regular expression has a default time-out of 2 seconds. 在执行该示例时，它会创建一个名为包含已编译的正则表达式的 RegexLib.dll 类库。When you execute the example, it creates a class library named RegexLib.dll that contains the compiled regular expression. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `(\w)\1+` 的定义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1+` is defined as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w)`|匹配任何单词字符，并将其分配给第一个捕获组。Match any word character and assign it to the first capturing group.| |`\1+`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的值的第一个捕获组。Match one or more occurrences of the value of the first captured group.| 下面的示例使用`DuplicatedChars`正则表达式以标识字符串数组中的重复字符。The following example uses the `DuplicatedChars` regular expression to identify duplicate characters in a string array. 当调用`DuplicatedChars`构造函数，它将更改为.5 秒的超时间隔。When it calls the `DuplicatedChars` constructor, it changes the time-out interval to .5 seconds. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1a.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示已编译的正则表达式是否具有公共可见性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the compiled regular expression has public visibility.

value.span: 如果正则表达式具有公共可见性，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the regular expression has public visibility; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`false`，由当前实例定义的正则表达式类可以实例化只能由中包含的类的程序集执行的代码。If the property is `false`, the regular expression class defined by the current instance can be instantiated only by code that is executing in the assembly that contains the class. 但是，由于方法生成只包含已编译正则表达式，并且不允许其他代码要添加的程序集，则通常无需将此属性的值分配`false`。However, because the method generates an assembly that contains only compiled regular expressions and does not allow additional code to be added, there is generally no reason to assign this property a value of `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan MatchTimeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan MatchTimeout
Public Property MatchTimeout As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan MatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.MatchTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置正则表达式的默认超时间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the regular expression's default time-out interval.

value.span: 在样式对的操作可经过的默认最长时间间隔时间，在 引发之前或 ，如果挂起被禁用。

span.span: The default maximum time interval that can elapse in a pattern-matching operation before a is thrown, or if time-outs are disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的已编译的正则表达式的默认超时间隔。The property defines the default time-out interval for the compiled regular expression. 此值表示已编译的正则表达式将执行单个匹配操作，操作超时前正则表达式引擎会抛出的时间的近似量在其下一步的计时检查过程中的异常。This value represents the approximate amount of time that a compiled regular expression will execute a single matching operation before the operation times out and the regular expression engine throws a exception during its next timing check. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我们建议你始终设置已编译的正则表达式的默认超时值。We recommend that you always set a default time-out value for a compiled regular expression. 正则表达式库的使用者可以通过传递覆盖该超时值值，该值表示新的超时间隔已编译的正则表达式的类构造函数。Consumers of your regular expression library can override that time-out value by passing a value that represents the new time-out interval to the compiled regular expression's class constructor. 可以将分配到的默认超时值处于以下任一对象：You can assign a default time-out value to a object in any of the following ways: - 通过调用方法并提供的字符串表示形式"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"属性值。By calling the method and providing the string representation of a value for the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property. - 通过调用构造函数，并提供值`matchTimeout`参数。By calling the constructor and providing a value for the `matchTimeout` parameter. - 通过设置此属性的值。By setting the value of this property. 若要设置合理的超时间隔，请考虑以下因素：To set a reasonable time-out interval, consider the following factors: - 长度和复杂性的正则表达式模式。The length and complexity of the regular expression pattern. 长而复杂的正则表达式需要比更简短和简单的更多的时间。Longer and more complex regular expressions require more time than shorter and simpler ones. - 预期的机负载。The expected machine load. 处理具有 CPU 和内存使用率高的系统上花费的时间。Processing takes more time on systems with high CPU and memory utilization. ## Examples 下面的示例定义名为单个已编译的正则表达式`DuplicateChars`标识两个或多个输入字符串中的相同字符。The following example defines a single compiled regular expression named `DuplicateChars` that identifies two or more occurrences of the same character in an input string. 已编译的正则表达式具有的默认超时为 2 秒。The compiled regular expression has a default time-out of 2 seconds. 在执行该示例时，它会创建一个名为包含已编译的正则表达式的 RegexLib.dll 类库。When you execute the example, it creates a class library named RegexLib.dll that contains the compiled regular expression. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `(\w)\1+` 的定义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1+` is defined as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w)`|匹配任何单词字符，并将其分配给第一个捕获组。Match any word character and assign it to the first capturing group.| |`\1+`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的值的第一个捕获组。Match one or more occurrences of the value of the first captured group.| 下面的示例使用`DuplicatedChars`正则表达式以标识字符串数组中的重复字符。The following example uses the `DuplicatedChars` regular expression to identify duplicate characters in a string array. 当调用`DuplicatedChars`构造函数，它将更改为.5 秒的超时间隔。When it calls the `DuplicatedChars` constructor, it changes the time-out interval to .5 seconds. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1a.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将生成包含已编译的正则表达式的程序集。The method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. 因此，不需要指定作为此属性的值之一。Therefore, you do not have to specify as one of the values of this property. 如果存在，选项将被忽略。If it is present, the option is ignored.

The regular expression to compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以包含任何有效的正则表达式。The property can contain any valid regular expression. 如果的值属性不是语法正确的正则表达式模式，在调用方法会抛出。If the value of the property is not a syntactically correct regular expression pattern, the call to the method throws an .
